mapper.insert: insert into covid_wz (name, caigou, xiabo, juanzeng, xiaohao, xuqiu, kucun) values(#{name}, #{caigou}, #{xiabo}, #{juanzeng}, #{xiaohao}, #{xuqiu}, #{kucun}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = #{name}, caigou = #{caigou}, xiabo = #{xiabo}, juanzeng = #{juanzeng}, xiaohao = #{xiaohao}, xuqiu = #{xuqiu}, kucun = #{kucun}
